nodes.text: The Ebiwaan system was a star system located in the Sarin sector within the Outer Rim territories. It contained the planet Ebiwaan.

Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim places the Ebiwaan system within the Mid Rim, but The Essential Atlas places it in the Outer Rim Territories. This article assumes the later is correct, as the atlas is a more recent source, and its online companion places the system in the Outer Rim as well.
